data.title: David Burtka and Neil Patrick Harris Annual Drag Brunch
data.meta_description: Absolut presents the David Burtka and Neil Patrick Harris Annual Drag Brunch sponsored by NYC Pride, where returning hosts, actor and c
data.text:
Absolut presents the David Burtka and Neil Patrick Harris Annual Drag Brunch sponsored by NYC Pride, where returning hosts, actor and cookbook author David Burtka and his husband, 5-time Emmy award winner Neil Patrick Harris, will emcee a show of epic proportions.

They'll join emcee Lea DeLaria (Orange Is the New Black) along with the most in-demand drag queens including RuPaul’s Drag Race contestants RAJA, Shangela, and Symone, and some of NYC's most popular queens including Merrie Cherry, Nicky O, Mariyea and Beaujangless, who will entertain and enliven the brunch experience like never before.

Before the performers take the stage, you’ll enjoy DeLaria's spectacular live piano performance and delicious brunch dishes. Craft cocktails, beer and wine will keep you fueled for the jaw-dropping performance presented by Queerty. The lively crowd, star performers and crave-worthy food and drink make this a brunch for the ages.
